title: MP refers himself to commissioner over 'cash for questions' claims
description: Leaked emails purport to show George Freeman asking a firm that employed him what questions he should ask ministers.
content:
A Conservative MP has referred himself to the standards commissioner after it was claimed a company that he worked for helped him write questions to government.
George Freeman asked the director at … [+3058 chars]

title: MP charged for accusing Lesotho king of signing over country to South Africa

title: MPs to vote on welfare bill as unrest rumbles on
description: The House of Commons will vote on welfare cuts bill this evening as some MPs call for further changes.
content:
Helen Catt
